arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: Porque se dedicaban a adorar a Dios en oración y en la lectura del Corán.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
